html:
2025-0528
2025-06-20JUSTax Court of Canada ActCommissioners for Administering Oaths ** Tax Court of Canada ** Order directing that Commissions do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering 3 officers of the Courts Administration Service to administer oaths and to take and receive affidavits, declarations and solemn affirmations, within or outside Canada, in or concerning any proceeding had or to be had in the Tax Court of Canada.N/A
subject: Commissioners for Administering Oaths ** Tax Court of Canada **
precis: Order directing that Commissions do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering 3 officers of the Courts Administration Service to administer oaths and to take and receive affidavits, declarations and solemn affirmations, within or outside Canada, in or concerning any proceeding had or to be had in the Tax Court of Canada.
